forumNotes.author: w2b
forumNotes.content:
![Posted Image](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&module=display&section=screenshot&id=18)
**File Name** : WiNToBootic  
**File Submitter** : [w2b](http://reboot.pro/user/47863-w2b/ "")  
**File Submitted** : 16 Aug 2011  
**File Updated** : *07 Apr 2013*   
**File Category** : [Boot tools](http://reboot.pro/files/category/7-boot-tools/ "")  

WiNToBootic is a freeware that allows you an easy creation of bootable Windows USB hard or flash disk from an ISO image, CD/DVD or Folder. This product is focused on creation of boot disks based on Microsoft Windows NT 6.x OS family (Vista, 7, 8, Server 2008, Server 2012).  

Key Features:

* Make bootable USB Flash or Hard Disk
* Supported boot image source: ISO image, CD/DVD or Folder
* Supported boot image OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, Server 2008, Server 2012, PE 2.x, PE 3.x
* Very Convenient and Fast
* Standalone, no istallation
* Run in Windows XP or later (32/64)

[www.wintobootic.com](http://www.wintobootic.com "External link")  

[Click here to download this file](http://reboot.pro/files/file/18-wintobootic/ "")
